title: Primary Password
content: I haven't been able to use my Mozilla Thunderbird emails for over a week because I have no idea what a "primary password" is!!! I have several email addresses in my T-bird account but my primary address is sorokespso@outlook.com. I don't know where it came up with pennysorokes@gmail.com. Please help cuz I HATE Outlook and miss my T-bird!
creator: pennysorokes

title: Email Links
content: I am using MX-Linux (mx-23). When I used to click on a link in an email, I was taken to Firefox where the link was opened in a tab for viewing. Now, I have to manually switch to Firefox using CTRL-F2 (F2 is location of the workspace where I have Firefox).
creator: tyropublishing

title: Lost folder
content: Another lost folder story. I have computer backups going back for 6 months so I can reinstall my lost profile which has the lost folder. My question is how do I extract that folder from my profile from the back up so that when I reinstall my current profile I can add (or whatever) the lost folder?
creator: keithinoz1
